body_html: I think making them virtual makes sense. To make one call the other, I'll have to update Cursor to have a method that yields a new vector with only the values, since currently a cursor is effectively a vector<pair<string, tensor>> which does't cooperate well with the tensor-only method. Should be a quick addition

body: I think making them virtual makes sense. To make one call the other, I'll have to update `Cursor` to have a method that yields a new vector with only the values, since currently a cursor is effectively a `vector<pair<string, tensor>>` which does't cooperate well with the tensor-only method. Should be a quick addition
